chapter.title: Creating a Signed Delegation - Parent Zone Activity
chapter.para: This section describes the steps required by a parent for creating a signed delegation.

section.title: Ensure that the Child Keysets were Received Over a Secure Channel
section.para: Secure communication between the parent and child zone is done out-of-band.

section.title: Ensure that Each Received Keyset is for a Delegated Zone
section.para: The owner name for the DNSKEY record in the received keyset must correspond to a valid delegation.

para.computeroutput: child-zone-name. 3600 IN DNSKEY 256 3 5 ( ... ); key id = keytag

section.para: child-zone-name must exist in the parent zone-file as a valid delegation.
